item.title: Bessent to propose major overhaul of regulatory body created from financial crisis
item.description: In a letter set to be released Thursday, Bessent will recommend changing the approach of the Financial Stability Oversight Council.

item.title: U.S. has to stop taking in 'below-average' immigrants who won't help economy, says Lutnick
item.description: The White House is rolling out its gold card visa.

item.title: Bessent says U.S. will finish the year with 3% GDP growth, sees 'very strong' holiday season
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the economy will end the year on strong footing and said the president was disappointed in economic coverage in ...

item.title: Core inflation rate watched by Fed hit 2.8%, delayed September data shows, lower than expected
item.description: The delayed core personal consumption expenditures price index for September was expected to show a 2.9% annual increase.

item.title: China slow-walks U.S. soybean purchases as stockpiles hit multi-year highs, undermining Trumpâ€™s trade deal claims
item.description: China will likely "slow-roll soybean purchases to bait the Trump administration into prolonged negotiations," an analyst says.
